Class MeasurableOutputStream

java.lang.Object
java.io.OutputStream
it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.io.MeasurableOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
MeasurableStream, Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:

public abstract class MeasurableOutputStream extends OutputStream implements MeasurableStream
An OutputStream that implements also the MeasurableStream interface.
